comment: I tried to contact her for a meeting and after a week she responded giving me her phone number. I called her at the time she told me to and she didn't answer. Responded a week later and rescheduled. When I did get her on the phone she was driving. By that point it was too late for her to even help me. Refused to bump me from a 69.47 to a 70. AVOID

The class is overall easy, but she makes it way harder than it needs to be. She is really bad at responding to emails and she is really rude. Plus, I'm 99% sure that she pretended to not get emails after I had to call the department chair to get her to respond (not saying that's what happened, but it was sketchy). Overall she is a bad person.

Honestly, I would be okay with all of the work if she would realize that this is a lower level course. Her grading criteria is ridiculous and even if you give her what she wants she always has something to comment on. Seriously, this is not a physics class lady, we're getting credit for basically having a pulse so calm down with the assignments.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: The class was super easy. Would totally recommend taking Wellness online. However, it is the professor I have an issue with. She wasn't understanding whatsoever with any kind of issue that conflicted with turning something in. Made in A in every module, except one where she would NOT help me with solving an issue. Not very personable, kind of rude.
Almost all of the work is done online with an awful and confusing website but Burleson is a pretty entertaining prof who rarely ever held class which is great if you're into that.
It's mainly an online class and she hates the software as much as the students. So to be honest, she's pretty cool. She's always willing to help if she knows you're putting in effort.
